sentences.sContent: But we know thermodynamics is all about equilibrium.
sentences.sContent_eng: But we know thermodynamics is all about equilibrium.
sentences.sCn: 但我们知道热力学都是关于平衡的。

sentences.sContent: And we went through that and saw what the thermodynamics worked out to be.
sentences.sContent_eng: And we went through that and saw what the thermodynamics worked out to be.
sentences.sCn: 我们算出了他们,并看到了它们的热力学应该是怎样的。

sentences.sContent: And so we can immediately start in deriving all of the thermodynamics, right?
sentences.sContent_eng: And so we can immediately start in deriving all of the thermodynamics, right?
sentences.sCn: 这样我们可以马上开始,得到所有热力学的量对吧？

words.tran: 热力学的；使用热动力的

trans.tranOther: the science that deals with the relationship between heat and other forms of energy
